indexdef: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX "SequelizeMeta_pkey" ON public."SequelizeMeta" USING btree (name)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX active_sessions_pkey ON public.active_sessions USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX active_sessions_session_token_key ON public.active_sessions USING btree (session_token)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_device ON public.active_sessions USING btree (device_fingerprint)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_expires ON public.active_sessions USING btree (expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_ip ON public.active_sessions USING btree (ip_address)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_last_activity ON public.active_sessions USING btree (last_activity)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_token ON public.active_sessions USING btree (session_token)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_user_active ON public.active_sessions USING btree (user_id, expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_active_sessions_user_id ON public.active_sessions USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX articles_pkey ON public.articles USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX articles_slug_key ON public.articles USING btree (slug)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX articles_slug_unique ON public.articles USING btree (slug)
CREATE INDEX idx_articles_author_id ON public.articles USING btree (author_id)

CREATE INDEX idx_articles_author_status_published ON public.articles USING btree (author_id, status, published_at) WHERE (status = ANY (ARRAY['published'::enum_articles_status, 'pending'::enum_articles_status]))
CREATE INDEX idx_articles_category_status ON public.articles USING btree (category, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_articles_featured ON public.articles USING btree (status, featured_image, published_at) WHERE ((status = 'published'::enum_articles_status) AND (featured_image IS NOT NULL))
CREATE INDEX idx_articles_status_published ON public.articles USING btree (status, published_at DESC) WHERE (status = 'published'::enum_articles_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_articles_status_published_at ON public.articles USING btree (status, published_at)
CREATE INDEX bets_bet_type ON public.bets USING btree (bet_type)
CREATE INDEX bets_created_at ON public.bets USING btree (created_at)
CREATE INDEX bets_fight_id_status ON public.bets USING btree (fight_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bets_fight_id_user_id ON public.bets USING btree (fight_id, user_id)
CREATE INDEX bets_matched_with ON public.bets USING btree (matched_with)
CREATE INDEX bets_parent_bet_id ON public.bets USING btree (parent_bet_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX bets_pkey ON public.bets USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX bets_proposal_status ON public.bets USING btree (proposal_status)
CREATE INDEX bets_status ON public.bets USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_fight_side ON public.bets USING btree (fight_id, side, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_fight_status_created_at ON public.bets USING btree (fight_id, status, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_fight_status_pending ON public.bets USING btree (fight_id, status) WHERE (status = 'pending'::enum_bets_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_parent_bet_proposal ON public.bets USING btree (parent_bet_id, proposal_status) WHERE (parent_bet_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_user_created_at ON public.bets USING btree (user_id, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_bets_user_status ON public.bets USING btree (user_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX event_connections_pkey ON public.event_connections USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_connections_connected_at ON public.event_connections USING btree (connected_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_connections_event_disconnected ON public.event_connections USING btree (event_id, disconnected_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_connections_event_id ON public.event_connections USING btree (event_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_event_connections_user_id ON public.event_connections USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX events_operator_id ON public.events USING btree (operator_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX events_pkey ON public.events USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX events_scheduled_date ON public.events USING btree (scheduled_date)
CREATE INDEX events_status ON public.events USING btree (status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX events_stream_key ON public.events USING btree (stream_key)
CREATE INDEX events_venue_id ON public.events USING btree (venue_id)
CREATE INDEX events_venue_id_scheduled_date ON public.events USING btree (venue_id, scheduled_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_events_scheduled_date ON public.events USING btree (scheduled_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_events_status_date_optimized ON public.events USING btree (status, scheduled_date, venue_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_events_status_scheduled_date ON public.events USING btree (status, scheduled_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_events_venue_status ON public.events USING btree (venue_id, status)
CREATE INDEX fights_event_id ON public.fights USING btree (event_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX fights_event_id_number ON public.fights USING btree (event_id, number)
CREATE INDEX fights_event_id_status ON public.fights USING btree (event_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX fights_pkey ON public.fights USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX fights_status ON public.fights USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_fights_event_betting ON public.fights USING btree (event_id, status) WHERE (status = 'betting'::enum_fights_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_fights_event_status ON public.fights USING btree (event_id, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_fights_event_status_number ON public.fights USING btree (event_id, status, number)
CREATE INDEX idx_membership_requests_pending ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (status, requested_at) WHERE (status = 'pending'::enum_membership_change_requests_status)

CREATE INDEX idx_membership_requests_pending_optimized ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (status, requested_at DESC, user_id) WHERE (status = 'pending'::enum_membership_change_requests_status)
CREATE INDEX idx_membership_requests_processor ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (processed_by)
CREATE INDEX idx_membership_requests_status_requested ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (status, requested_at DESC) WHERE (status IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_membership_requests_user_status ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (user_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX membership_change_requests_pkey ON public.membership_change_requests USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_expires_at ON public.notifications USING btree (expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_type ON public.notifications USING btree (type)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_id ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_read ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, is_read, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_notifications_user_unread ON public.notifications USING btree (user_id, is_read, created_at) WHERE (is_read = false)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX notifications_pkey ON public.notifications USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_created_at ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_status ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_subscription_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (subscription_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_type_status ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (transaction_type, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_user_id ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_payment_transactions_user_status ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (user_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_idempotency_key_key ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (idempotency_key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_idempotency_key_unique ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (idempotency_key) WHERE (idempotency_key IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_kushki_transaction_id_key ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (kushki_transaction_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_kushki_transaction_id_unique ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (kushki_transaction_id) WHERE (kushki_transaction_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX payment_transactions_pkey ON public.payment_transactions USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX schema_migrations_pkey ON public.schema_migrations USING btree (version)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_expires_at ON public.subscriptions USING btree (expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_retry ON public.subscriptions USING btree (retry_count, max_retries)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_status ON public.subscriptions USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_status_expires ON public.subscriptions USING btree (status, expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_type ON public.subscriptions USING btree (type)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_user_active ON public.subscriptions USING btree (user_id, status, expires_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_user_created ON public.subscriptions USING btree (user_id, created_at DESC) WHERE (user_id IS NOT NULL)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_user_id ON public.subscriptions USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_subscriptions_user_status ON public.subscriptions USING btree (user_id, status)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX subscriptions_kushki_subscription_id_key ON public.subscriptions USING btree (kushki_subscription_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX subscriptions_pkey ON public.subscriptions USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_system_settings_category ON public.system_settings USING btree (category)
CREATE INDEX idx_system_settings_key ON public.system_settings USING btree (key)
CREATE INDEX idx_system_settings_public ON public.system_settings USING btree (is_public)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX system_settings_key_key ON public.system_settings USING btree (key)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX system_settings_pkey ON public.system_settings USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_transactions_wallet_date ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id, created_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_transactions_wallet_status_created_at ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id, status, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_transactions_wallet_type ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id, type, status)
CREATE INDEX idx_transactions_wallet_type_status ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id, type, status)
CREATE INDEX transactions_created_at ON public.transactions USING btree (created_at)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX transactions_pkey ON public.transactions USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX transactions_reference ON public.transactions USING btree (reference)
CREATE INDEX transactions_status ON public.transactions USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX transactions_type ON public.transactions USING btree (type)
CREATE INDEX transactions_wallet_id ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id)
CREATE INDEX transactions_wallet_id_created_at ON public.transactions USING btree (wallet_id, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_approved ON public.users USING btree (approved)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_business_entities ON public.users USING gin (((profile_info -> 'businessEntities'::text)))
CREATE INDEX idx_users_email_active ON public.users USING btree (email, is_active)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_email_login_optimized ON public.users USING btree (email, is_active, last_login)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_gallera_status ON public.users USING btree (((((profile_info -> 'businessEntities'::text) -> 'gallera'::text) ->> 'status'::text))) WHERE (role = 'gallera'::enum_users_role)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_id_active ON public.users USING btree (id, is_active) WHERE (is_active = true)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_profile_info_gin ON public.users USING gin (profile_info)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role_active ON public.users USING btree (role, is_active)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role_active_last_login ON public.users USING btree (role, is_active, last_login)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role_active_optimized ON public.users USING btree (role, is_active, created_at)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_role_approved ON public.users USING btree (role, approved)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_venue_status ON public.users USING btree (((((profile_info -> 'businessEntities'::text) -> 'venue'::text) ->> 'status'::text))) WHERE (role = 'venue'::enum_users_role)
CREATE INDEX idx_users_verification_token ON public.users USING btree (verification_token)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_email ON public.users USING btree (email)
CREATE INDEX users_is_active ON public.users USING btree (is_active)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_pkey ON public.users USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX users_role ON public.users USING btree (role)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX users_username ON public.users USING btree (username)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_pending ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (status, requested_at) WHERE ((status)::text = 'pending'::text)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_requested ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (requested_at DESC)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_status ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (status)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_type ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (operation_type)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_user ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (user_id)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallet_operations_wallet ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (wallet_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallet_operations_pkey ON public.wallet_operations USING btree (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_wallets_user_id ON public.wallets USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallets_pkey ON public.wallets USING btree (id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallets_user_id ON public.wallets USING btree (user_id)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX wallets_user_id_unique ON public.wallets USING btree (user_id)
